text: Spike is a fictional vampire that appears in the television series Buffy the Vampire Slayer and the spin-off Angel. He was played by James Marsters. ==Fictional biography== William the Bloody (known for his bad poetry) of England was sired by Angelus. He liked being a vampire and moved into Sunnydale by 1997. ==Reception== Spike is a fan-favorite vampire.
